snippet: Defense lawyers kept the focus on the legitimacy of the military tribunal process that the government is using instead of a civilian trial.
abstract: Defense lawyers at military tribunal hearing in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, keep focus on legitimacy of process that government is using instead of civilian trial; case involves Khalid Shaikh Mohammed and four other detainees accused of aiding Sept 11 terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: Defense lawyers kept the focus on the legitimacy of the military tribunal process that the government is using instead of a civilian trial.

headline.seo: Legal Clashes at Hearing for Defendants in 9/11 Case
headline.main: Legal Clashes at Hearing for Defendants in 9/11 Case
headline.print_headline: Legal Clashes at Hearing For Defendants in 9/11 Case
